pages.title: Liquid Crystal
pages.text: The pure energy of gemstones in liquid form. It is said to have a healing effect.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Combining it with various other liquids results in all kinds of interesting looking materials.

Letting Liquid Crystal collide with $(l:magical_blocks/mud)Liquid Mud$() created $(item)Clay$()! Surely there are more combinations to discover!$(br2)$(italic)Thomas had never seen such unbalance before.$()
Letting a full block of Liquid Crystal absorb the immense heat of Lava resulted in this.$(br)Almost feels like a $(item)Magma Block$(), albeit way hotter.
As $(item)Water$() tried to flow into a full block of Liquid Crystal the crystal solidified.$(br)Since even a light touch is enough to give you a cold shiver, you called it Frostbite Crystal.
This is an interesting one. When $(item)Flowers$() absorb this magical liquid through their roots, they turn into those elusive plants.
